Uses of Interface
explicit.rewards.MCRewards

  • Packages that use MCRewards 
    Package Description
    explicit
    Explicit-state probabilistic model checking engine, implemented in Java, and quantitative abstraction refinement techniques (see QuantAbstractRefine).
    explicit.rewards

      default double DTMC.mvMultRewJacSingle(int s, double[] vect, MCRewards mcRewards)
      Do a single row of matrix-vector multiplication and sum of reward, Jacobi-style, i.e., return ( rew(s) + sum_{t!=s} P(s,t)*vect[t] ) / (1 - P(s,s))

    • Uses of MCRewards in explicit.rewards

      Classes in explicit.rewards that implement MCRewards 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MCRewardsFromMDPRewards
      Explicit-state representation of a DTMC rewards structure, constructed (implicitly) from an MDP rewards structure and a memoryless deterministic strategy, specified as an array of integer indices.
      class  StateRewards
      Explicit-state storage of just state rewards.
      class  StateRewardsArray
      Explicit-state storage of just state rewards (as an array).
      class  StateRewardsConstant
      Explicit-state storage of constant state rewards.
      class  StateRewardsSimple
      Explicit-state storage of just state rewards (mutable).
